level.heading: Supporting evidence required to support payment of benefits due to domestic violence.
level.text: A claimant may be eligible to receive benefits for separation from employment due to domestic violence provided that one of the following is submitted to support the claim of domestic violence:
A governmental agency or court record, such as a court order, a Petition for a Civil Protection Order, or a record or report from Child Services; or
